snippet: A group of activists is scrutinizing the Tour de France for hints of doping by comparing current performances with past ones. But the fairness of their methods has been questioned.
abstract: Group of activists is scrutinizing the Tour de France for hints of doping, using methods that include independent analysis of riders' doping tests and comparison of current performances with past ones; though their work is contentious and often criticized, it is also read by riders and cycling journalists, and debate is has sparked may be having an impact.
lead_paragraph: A group of activists is scrutinizing the Tour de France for hints of doping by comparing current performances with past ones. But the fairness of their methods has been questioned.

headline.main: Watchdogs Seek Doping Clues From a Distance
headline.print_headline: Watchdogs Seek Doping Clues From a Distance
